4ch AUDIO PLAYBACK

OptionDescription
XLRThe camera plays audio recorded via external micro- phones connected via the XLR microphone adapter.
CAMERAThe camera plays audio recorded via the camera's built-in microphone or external microphones connected via the microphone jack.
Adjust audio settings for use when viewing 4ch movies.

You can also switch sources while viewing the playback display by
pressing the center of the focus stick (focus lever).

# ES ELECTRONIC SHUTTER VOLUME

shutter. Choose OFF to disable the shutter sound.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| XLR | The camera plays audio recorded via external micro- phones connected via the XLR microphone adapter. |
| CAMERA | The camera plays audio recorded via the camera's built-in microphone or external microphones connected via the microphone jack. |
